Address: 108 WILMOT RD, DEERFIELD, Illinois, 60015, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc., a Delaware corporation ("Walgreens Boots Alliance"), is a global leader in retail and wholesale pharmacy, touching millions of lives every day through dispensing and distributing medicines, its convenient retail locations, digital platforms and health and beauty products with sales of $136.9 billion in the fiscal year ended August 31, 2019. We have more than 100 years of trusted health care heritage and innovation in community pharmacy and pharmaceutical wholesaling. Our purpose is to help people across the world lead healthier and happier lives. Walgreens Boots Alliance is the largest retail pharmacy, health and daily living destination across the United States and Europe. Walgreens Boots Alliance and the companies in which it has equity method investments together have a presence in more than 251 countries and employ more than 440,0001 people.  ... More ...
